title: A new breed of finance frontrunners face the future: SMBs embrace the metaverse and cryptocurrency, Sage finds - GlobeNewswire
content: A new breed of finance frontrunners face the future: SMBs embrace the metaverse and cryptocurrency, Sage finds  GlobeNewswire
description: Half (52%) believe decentralized currencies will prove ‘extremely’ viable as a long-term payment solutionA third (33%) plan to accept digital currencies...
